snippet.title: Outlaws of the Old West - Early Access Trailer
snippet.description:
Outlaws of the Old West is a massively multiplayer survival MMO with a huge world, thousands of items and a modular building system. Survive the wild, build your own homestead, defeat villainous bandits and work with others to tame the Wild West.
https://outlawsoftheoldwest.com/

Steam Store Page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/840800/Outlaws_of_the_Old_West/

Follow us on Social Media!
Twitter: https://twitter.com/Official_WW_Dev
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/OfficialWanderingWizard
